title: Obama’s Biden Administration | Guests: Bill O’Reilly & Ric Grenell | 6/4/21
description:
Companies are changing their logos to pride logos, except in the Middle East and China. Ryan Girdusky, author of "They’re Not Listening," calls in to discuss his new 1776 Project PAC that will support school board candidates who are fighting against critical race theory. Bill O’Reilly calls in to discuss similarities between the Biden and Obama administrations, the latest Russian cyberattacks under Biden, and Fauci and the origin of COVID-19. Former Acting Director of National Intelligence Richard Grenell shares his insight on the increase in foreign cyberattacks. Patty Hidalgo Menders, a mother suing a Virginia school board over equity programs, calls in to share what sparked her to take legal action.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
